data.prayer: the state of Quebradillas has (about) 7,478 people who know Jesus, 14,268 people who know about him culturally, and 1,254 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quebradillas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Quebradillas, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Quebradillas, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Quebradillas, Puerto Rico to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Quebradillas, Puerto Rico to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Quebradillas who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 15,522 lost in Quebradillas that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Quebradillas, Puerto Rico that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Quebradillas, Puerto Rico has a population of 23,000.

We estimate Quebradillas has 7,478 people who might know Jesus, 14,268 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,254 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
